settings.text: Carbon Ceramic Technolgy
Slows down heat
Boosts comfort
Up to 88% IR rejection
>99.9% UV protection
Superior glare reduction
No fade or color change
Lifetime Warranty*
Ships within 48 business hours

settings.code:
Step 1: Choose the vehicle type that most closely resembles your vehicle.

Step 2: Choose your shade. See the shades graphic below to help you decide which shade will work best for you.

Step 3: Type in your vehicle's year, make, and model.

Step 4: Choose your vehicle's appropriate style and/or door count.

Step 5: Select a quantity. Most likely one.

Step 6: Add to cart.

Note: Pre-cut patterns typically ship out within two business days.

The Epitome of Style, Protection, and Comfort

Panaflex is our best-selling ceramic window tint that is designed to slow down the heat and stop harmful solar energy.

settings.title: Performance Data
settings.content: All tested materials were applied on a ¼” clear glass surface in accordance with industry standard tests. The intended purpose of the data provided is for comparison purposes only.

settings.title: Construction
settings.content: Constructed as a traditional 2ply, 1.5mil film, Panaflex contains nano particles of carbon in between two weatherable layers of polyester followed by a non-conductive layer of ceramic found in the hard coat which slows down the heat. All of this is tied together with our superior Carbamate HD™ adhesive system designed to last longer, bond faster, and dry ultra clear.

settings.title: Shades
settings.content: The lower the percentage, the darker the shade. The higher the percentage, the lighter the shade.

settings.title: Purchase Instructions
settings.content:
Step 1: Choose the vehicle type that most closely resembles your vehicle.

Step 2: Choose your shade. See the shades graphic below to help you decide which shade will work best for you.

Step 3: Type in your vehicle's year, make, and model.

Step 4: Choose your vehicle's appropriate style and/or door count.

Step 5: Select a quantity. Most likely one.

Step 6: Add to cart.

Note: Pre-cut patterns typically ship out within two business days.

settings.title: Tool Kit
settings.text: All the tools necessary to start tinting windows.

settings.testimonial: "I love Flexfilm. The customer service and products are amazing. I love that I can find almost any tool I need, in one place. Thanks Ralph and team."
settings.author: Alexis Steele

settings.testimonial: "As an installer I think it is a very high quality product and from my customers stand point they are extremely happy."
settings.author: Craig Haney

settings.testimonial: "Flexfilm is the best hands down for the prices and service. You can't find anything better out there..."
settings.author: Sean Wahlberg

settings.testimonial: "Been using it for 2+ years and I love it shrinks like a dream and I have never had a problem with it at all."
settings.author: Bradley Jones

settings.testimonial: "This company is great to work with, and the tint works amazing!"
settings.author: Preston Raber

settings.testimonial: "I have been using your film for almost 7 years now and never had a problem."
settings.author: Zane Wilson

settings.testimonial: "Works great! Definitely a go to for me. As a newbie I have enjoyed how easy it is to work with."
settings.author: Ryan Mclane

settings.testimonial: "I've used most of the industry leaders. I'm with Flexfilm now"
settings.author: Terrance Garnto

settings.title: Put The Brakes On The Heat
settings.text: The latest in heat insulation technology utilizes non-conductive ceramic to slow down the transfer of heat into the vehicle’s interior, creating a more comfortable and cool ride.

settings.title: High IR Rejection
settings.text: An additional coating of ceramic particle technology combined with nano carbon allows Panaflex to block up to 88% of the infrared radiation (IR) heat from the sun.

settings.title: Extensive UV Protection
settings.text: Blocks over 99.9% of A and B ultraviolet (UV) rays from the sun that can lead to skin cancers and skin damage.

settings.title: Uncompromised Clarity
settings.text: We guarantee you will not find a more powerful window film with less low angle haze on the market.

settings.title: Carbamate HD Adhesive
settings.text: Our proprietary high density adhesive lasts longer, bonds faster, and improves the ease of installation.

settings.title: True Carbon
settings.text: We rely on carbon alone to give the product its beautiful colors and consistent shades without the need for dye or pigment.

settings.title: No Fade and Color Change
settings.text: Nano particles of carbon, oxide material, and the absence of dye ensures a superior, color stable film that will never fade or change color, unlike ceramic-dye hybrid films.

settings.title: Advanced Shrinking
settings.text: The crisp, paper-like feel makes Panaflex easy to install on even the most advanced back windows.

settings.title: Lifetime Warranty
settings.text: We back Panaflex with our limited lifetime warranty that covers customers anywhere in the United States.
